game.name: MiniMo: Crazy Chase
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Who will complete their collection first? The key-chasing MONSTERS... or the monster-chasing ROBOT?? Only one way to find out in this fast-paced, asymmetrical hide 'n seek party game for up to 5 players that'll have your monstrous (or robotic) heart beating a mile a minute!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Who will complete their collection first? The key-chasing MONSTERS... or the monster-chasing ROBOT?? Only one way to find out in this fast-paced, asymmetrical hide 'n seek party game for up to 5 players that'll have your monstrous (or robotic) heart beating a mile a minute!
